questions.text: Who got a new video camera?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	He said it was an expensive one as well. He said it would pay for itself because he planned to stage videos for shows like "America's Funniest Videos".

Frasier's secretary.

	Shauna was played by Kristen Cloke. Cloke was born September 2, 1968.

questions.text: What did Cliff get a job video taping?
questions.explanation:
50th anniversary.

	He was going to get paid $50 for it. The man was skeptical at first because Cliff had his mailman's uniform on, but Cliff said it was for a costume ball.

Yes.

	Sam told Frasier that if he didn't ask Shauna out, Sam would. Frasier had trouble asking but he finally did ask her out.

The Runaway Bunny.

	She said she read it a 1,000 times to her children and every time she cried. "The Runaway Bunny" was written by Margaret Wise Brown, who also wrote "Goodnight, Moon".

questions.text: What did Frasier show Sam in the men's room?
questions.explanation:
Hairpiece.

	Frasier looked ridiculous in it. Sam said it just wasn't Frasier. Frasier leaves it in the bathroom sink and Woody finds it and tells Sam "those things are back!"

questions.text: What bad thing happened during the party?
questions.correct: The battery of the camcorder died.
questions.explanation:
The battery of the camcorder died.

	Cliff didn't have a spare battery either. He also had no power cord.

questions.text: What did Shauna forget to mention about dinner?
questions.correct: That her family would be there
options: That she had a big attack dog
That her parents' corpses were in the house
questions.explanation:
That her family would be there.

	Frasier said that many people Shauna's age moved back home. Shauna's dad said it wasn't her choice.

questions.text: Why did Shauna want to date Frasier?
questions.correct: So her parents would let her go out with Rick.
options: She was desperate for a date.
questions.explanation:
So her parents would let her go out with Rick.

	Her parents disapproved of Rick. Rick was a biker who dropped out of school.

questions.text: What happened at the end of the party that wasn't caught on film?
questions.correct: The grandmother stood up from her wheelchair.
options: The grandmother asked the grandfather for a divorce.
The grandmother collapsed from a stroke.
questions.explanation:
The grandmother stood up from her wheelchair.

	A lot happened after they ran out of film. The grandfather told all the kids he loved them, the grandson came home from the military to tell her grandparents "Happy anniversary. I love you", and then the grandmother standing.
